rules_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Reappropriate: Add {U} or {R}. [i](Exile exactly two cards from your hand and/or graveyard.)[/i] [i](To reappropriate, exile exactly two cards from your hand and/or graveyard.)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“At night, the dead revel in the halls of the living. Join them with caution; though their tables are plentiful and their gifts generous, they [/i]will [i]see you come back for more.”
—Vakavanha, Who Sees Anew[/i]
